doc.after: In the database the information of the secondary structure and the primary sequence represented by the MSA is combined in statistical models called profile stochastic context free grammars SCFGs also known as covariance models These are analogous to hidden Markov models used for protein family annotation in the Pfam database 1 Each family in the database is represented by two multiple sequence alignments in Stockholm format and a SCFG
